00015 require_once (t3lib_extMgm::extPath('gimmefive') . 'Classes/Component/F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager.php');
00016 
00023 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default_testcase extends PHPUnit_Framework_TestCase {
00024 
00025         protected $components;
00026         protected $validator;
00027 
00028         protected function setUp() {
00029                 $this->componentManager = F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager::getInstance();
00030                 $this->validator = $this->componentManager->getComponent("F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default");
00031         }
00032 
00033         protected function tearDown() {
00034                 unset($this->validator);
00035                 unset($this->componentManager);
00036         }
00037 
00038         public function test_required() {
00039                 $fakeGp = array();
00040                 $fakeGp['lastname'] = "Test";
00041 
00042                 $fakeSettings = array();
00043                 $fakeSettings['fieldConf.']['lastname.']['errorCheck.'][1] = "required";
00044                 $errors = array();
00045 
00046                 //field is filled out
00047                 $this->assertTrue($this->validator->validate($fakeGp,$fakeSettings,$errors));
00048 
00049                 $fakeGp['lastname'] = "";
00050 
00051                 //field is not filled out
00052                 $this->assertFalse($this->validator->validate($fakeGp,$fakeSettings,$errors));
00053 
00054         }
00055 
00056         public function test_email() {
00057                 $fakeGp = array();
00058                 $fakeGp['email'] = "email@host.com";
00059 
00060                 $fakeSettings = array();
00061                 $fakeSettings['fieldConf.']['email.']['errorCheck.'][1] = "email";
00062                 $errors = array();
00063 
00064                 //valid email
00065                 $this->assertTrue($this->validator->validate($fakeGp,$fakeSettings,$errors));
00066 
00067                 $fakeGp['email'] = "!%&$/@$/$%&.com";
00068 
00069                 //invalid characters
00070                 $this->assertFalse($this->validator->validate($fakeGp,$fakeSettings,$errors));
00071 
00072                 $fakeGp['email'] = "ajksdhf";
00073 
00074                 //invalid syntax
00075                 $this->assertFalse($this->validator->validate($fakeGp,$fakeSettings,$errors));
00076 
00077                 $fakeGp['email'] = "ajksdhf.com";
00078 
00079                 //invalid syntax 2
00080                 $this->assertFalse($this->validator->validate($fakeGp,$fakeSettings,$errors));
00081 
00082                 $fakeGp['email'] = "aasd@ajksdhfcom";
00083 
00084                 //invalid syntax 3
00085                 $this->assertFalse($this->validator->validate($fakeGp,$fakeSettings,$errors));
00086 
00087                 $fakeGp['email'] = "aasd@127.0.0.1";
00088 
00089                 //valid syntax
00090                 $this->assertFalse($this->validator->validate($fakeGp,$fakeSettings,$errors));
00091 
00092         }
00093 
00094 
00095 }
00096 ?>
